mapper.insert: insert into sales (sales_price, sales_createAT, sales_state, sales_time, service_id, cust_id) values (#{sales_price}, now(), #{sales_state}, #{sal_time}, #{service_id}, #{cust_id})
mapper.select: select sales.id, sales_price, sales_createAT, sales_state, sales_time, service.service_nm as service_nm, cust.cust_nm as cust_nm from sales, cust, service where service_id = service.id and cust.id = cust_id and sales_state = 1
